io.appium.droiddriver.runner

Annotation Type UseUiAutomation


  • @Inherited
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface UseUiAutomation
    This annotation indicates that its target needs UiAutomation. It is effectively equivalent to @MinSdkVersion(Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN_MR2), just more explicit.

    As any annotations, it is useful only if it is processed by tools. TestRunner filters out tests with this annotation if the current device has SDK version below 18 (JELLY_BEAN_MR2).
